introduction_key2: Iss course ko use kar kar hum linux karna seekhenge. Aapko ensure karna hai, aapko yeh commands theek se samajh aur use karna aata hai.
introduction_key3: `Terminal` ko dhang se use karne ke liye, `errors` ko sahi se padhna sabse jyada important hai.
introduction_key4: Agar aap `errors` ko theek se nahi padhoge, toh aap bahut jyada stuck feel karoge. `Error` ko English mei padh kar, hindi mei samjhiye, aur phir thoda time de yeh samajhne ke liye ki `terminal` aap se kya bolna chahta hoga.
